title: Assorted Essays and Poetry
description: Here are essays and poetry that touch on a broad range of subjects. Within these electronic pages lay proof that Edgar Allan Poe had Post Traumatic Stress Disorder, a step by step guide on how to find a mate, poetry about bare-knuckle fighting, an essay explaining the need for non-verbal communication when counseling child sex-abuse victims, and much, much more.
author: Cedric Nye
